discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Sɛ obi de nsɛm foforɔ to mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmu adaka yi mu a wɔbɛnya nkaebɔ. Wobɛtumi asesa baabi biribi kɔso wɔ wo nkaebɔ nom sɛnea wopɛ no.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Nnipa ɛwɔ {{SITENAME}} bɛtumi de  [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|kasa bia]] asuma amansan kaseɛbɔ ama wo na wobɛ nya nkaebɔ sɛ ɔmo yɛ a.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Nnipa a wɔ ha {{SITENAME}} bɛtumi de [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|kasa bia]] asuma amansan kaseɛbɔ a ɛkyerɛ sesa yɛ a ɛwɔ IP akyerakwan a wode di dwuma.

Dodoɔ IP akyerɛkan sesa meretiamu, na mpɛn pii no nnipa dodoɔ no kyɛ. Wobɛtumi [$1 abue account] anaa [$2 bɛwura mu] sɛ neɛ bɛ ya ɛnfa mpenkyenpenkyenmu ma wɔn a apue dada no. Wobue account no sea wo IP akwankyerɛ.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|Kasa biaeɛ]] yɛ babia nnipa totoa adwene wɔ kwan a wɔbtumi ayɛ biaeɛ {{SITENAME}} ɛyɛ papa. Hyɛ adwenkyerɛ foforɔ a ɛbua kwan na ɛde nkabom {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|with}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Deɛ wobɛka wɔ ha bɛda adi ama amansan ahunu.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Kasa biaeɛ]] yɛ biaeɛ nnipa bɛtumi atoatoa adwene a wobɛyɛ biaeɛ {{SITENAME}} ɛbɛ yɛ papa paa. Fa saa biaeɛ hyɛ adwenkyere a ɛba ma w'atumi asesa nnoɔma a ɛwɔ IP akwankyeremu. Deɛ wo beka wɔ ha beda adi ama amansan ahunu. Dodoɔ IP akwankyerɛ sesa meretiamu mu, na mpɛn pii no afoforɔ kyɛ.
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Wa dwenkyerɛ no ntumi sea, firi sɛ obi foforɔ akyerɛ na dwene saa bia naa mu. Nti sane bue bia no foforɔ anaa hwɛ adwenkerɛ foforɔ no.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Yɛ ntumi nhunu wa dwenkyerɛ a wode bua saa biaeɛ ha. Ɛbia apepa anaa sɛ afiri ha kɔ biaeɛ foforɔ.
Mepakyaw saa bue bia ha na yɛ biem.
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: Sɛ wohyɛ nkɔmɔdi foforɔ ase anaa sɛ woka biribi fa nkɔmɔdi bi a ɛwɔ hɔ dada ho a, sɛ afoforɔ ka nsɛm foforɔ fa ho a wɔ aberɛ a w'ani nna woho so no wobɛnya nkaebɔ
